thread.title: Does Yahoo have the key to killing the password?
thread.title_full: Does Yahoo have the key to killing the password?

title: Does Yahoo have the key to killing the password?
text:
Does Yahoo have the key to killing the password? Published: 16 October 2015 11:21 AM 
Yahoo Account Key is a new feature rolled out yesterday, that promises to take the pain out of remembering passwords. 
It only works on Yahoo accounts but, if you have them and also have a smartphone running the Yahoo mail app, you'll potentially never need to type in your password again. 
Once an account and a smartphone are linked, logging into Yahoo on a desktop or any other device should be simple. 
Just enter the Yahoo ID and a push notification will appear on the linked smartphone. Accept the notification and the login is complete. The account is accessible and there was no need to type in a password. 
Yahoo Account Key is part of the latest update to the Yahoo mail app and is available to download now for Android and iOS. â€“ AFP-Relaxnews, October 14,
